title: Register or log in to student finance

details.description: Log in to your student finance account or sign up for a new one - see when your payments are due,  track your application, change your details and apply for new finance
details.alternative_title: Apply or register for student finance or log in to student finance
details.more_information:
Applications for courses starting from 1 September 2013 will open in January 2013.

Part-time students can also apply by post. The address is on the form.

Download ‘Tuition Fee Loan application form for new part-time students (PDF, 1.1MB)

If you’ve forgotten your log in, reset your password and find your details.

Student Finance England

Telephone: 0845 300 50 90
Minicom: 0845 604 44 34
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Saturday and Sunday, 9am to 5:30pm

Change your details

You can change your details (eg address, bank details) using your online student finance account.

You must contact Student Finance England by phone if:

  • your household income changes
  • your name changes
  • your marital status changes
  • your parents have more children

Once you’ve started your course, contact your university or  college to change your Tuition Fee Loan or course.
details.introduction:
Log in to your student finance account or sign up. Once registered, you can apply for student finance, see when payments are due, track your application and change your details.

This service will be unavailable on Sunday 25 November from 4pm to 8pm.

details.description: Including loans, bursaries, grants, student finance and paying back loans
Get help if you're at school, planning to go on to further or higher education, looking for training or interested in a student or career development loan.
